title: Pres. elect. rules, outcomes in course countries

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe why countries have electoral rules for presidents. Describe two different presidential electoral rules that are important in determining election outcomes in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. Explain how different election rules serve political objectives for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe why countries have electoral rules for presidents. Describe two different presidential electoral rules that are important in determining election outcomes in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. Explain how different election rules serve political objectives for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
